word:
Tracts on Health Reform 

                                      R. & H., Nov. 4, 1875 
     794. There should be more earnest efforts made to enlighten the people upon the great subject of health reform. Tracts of four, eight, twelve, sixteen, and more pages, 
                                                                           462
containing pointed, well-written articles on this great question, should be scattered like the leaves of autumn. 
     [SANITARIUM PATIENTS TO BE TAUGHT IN PARLOR LECTURES--426] 
     [SANITARIUM PATIENTS TO BE TAUGHT CORRECT DIET BY PROPERLY FURNISHED TABLE--442, 443] 
     [SANITARIUM PATIENTS TO BE TAUGHT TEMPERANCE--474]
